item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome! I’m Ruben Berenguel, the mind behind the writing here at mostlymaths.net. I have a PhD in Mathematics and work as a Lead Data Engineer. I have a varied set of interests, that range from programming (my current work) to bespoke shoemaking (a previous work). You can imagine how much fits in-between. You can reach me via: Twitter LinkedIn At ruben at this domain You can find code I have written or contributed to, and slides for talks I have given at github.
